headline: Carbon Capture Materials Research Report 2025-2030: Development of Bio-Derived and Circular Carbon Capture Materials, Integration of Capture Systems With Utilization and Mineralization Technologies
summary: The carbon capture materials market is set to expand from USD 66.90 billion in 2025 to USD 99.09 billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 8.2%. Key growth drivers include stringent climate policies, corporate sustainability commitments, and technological advancements. Notably, liquid solvents and adsorptions emerge as the fastest-growing segments by material and process, due to their efficiency in CO2 capture. The oil & gas sector leads in demand, driven by emission reduction pressures and enhanced oil r
